summary:
A follower based on Katria from Lost to the Ages.

She can be found at the Winking Skeever in Solitude
She is a Combat Ranger and has a preference for Ranged Combat
descriptionHtml:
[center]

[size=3]
Always wanted Katria as a follower from the Lost to the Ages Quest, but found her being,
well.... dead made that a little difficult?

Now she can join you as 'Katrina'.(Katria's 'twin' Sister). She had one of those-who knew?
Standalone, recruit-able follower.

Location
She can be found in the Winking Skeever in Solitude.
She is a Combat Ranger, proficient in Archery, 1h, Shield and Light Armor
Max Level 100


This follower is completely dis-connected from Lost to the Ages Quest.
Still, I suggest recruiting her AFTER Lost to the Ages quest is over (for consistency sake if nothing else.)
Compatible with all body types.
[/size][/center][size=3]

Installation[/size]
Install with Mod Manager

Optional file:

RM 3.0+ Preset for Katrina (Katria). Extract and copy to SKSE\Plugin\Chargen and load. Preset uses all vanilla assets.

Image Credits
Outfit - Ashara Princess of the Woods by SydneyB'
Hat and Accessories - ZZjays Wardrobe 
Mature skin texture and body for UNP CBBE ADEC by Maeven2

author: Mebantiza

files.name: Katria Racemenu Preset
files.changelogHtml:
v1.0
-Revised Perks and general updates to ESP.
-New ESP

If updating from a previous verion.

-Be sure to dismiss any existing versions of Katrina and delete v.99 from your save. Failure to do so, will result in 2 versions of Katrina in your game.

files.name: Katria as Follower-'Katrina'
files.changelogHtml:
Cleaned and updated the ESP
-Small tweaks to her perks
-Added marriage option.
